value:
My father granted Prince Leif refuge...
This gave the empire a pretext to
intervene, and he lost his life.$k$pFather abhorred fighting and was
unfailingly kind... And he paid a
terrible price for his kindness!

They would have me marry Prince
Leif and become queen. He, however,
has loftier matters on his mind.

It is true that I was a hostage, but
Count Conomor did what he could
to grant me some small freedoms.

If you have the time, I'd speak with
you. Please, tell me about this land,
and the battles it has faced.

Shut up in a fusty cell in that
monastery, I could scarcely breathe. I
do like to stretch my legs these days.

I am Miranda, princess of Ulster. I
carry tidings as a close confidant of
$Nf.

I will not stop until
Ulster is restored!

Powerlessness begets regret. To
avoid that pain, one must put in
the effort to become stronger.

I will never lose heart. My
father's anguish must be
dispelled!

By the pride of Ulster, I will
not forget your kindness.

Where am I? What is this place?
I am Miranda of Ulster. State your
name, you rude creature!

Do you have a moment? I would
apologize for my conduct when I
was first called here.$k$pI was sorely upset, but that rudeness
ill befits a princess. I apologize.$k$pI also have a request... When the
fighting here ends, what would you
say to accompanying me to Ulster?$k$pThe longer I spend here, the surer I
am that your steady hand would help
me overcome my own hardships.$k$pIndeed, that is the only reason I ask!
Did you perceive another motive?
Er...$k$pThis request may be extreme, and if
so, I would withdraw it. For now, I
will focus on aiding you here!
はあっ
Vanish!
きゃああっ
Not a chance.
How I resent you!
I am a girl, not a fool!
Get out of my sight!
I want to go back...
Hehe...
I am Miranda, princess of Ulster.
*yelp* What in the world do you think you're doing? I am a princess!
No matter how low I fall, I will never forsake the pride of Ulster.
My father was a kind man. He never wanted to go to war. To think that granting refuge to Prince Leif would result in this...
My one aim is to take back Ulster. I will avenge my father!
I do understand, you know. That none of this is really Prince Leif's fault...
I sense no falsehoods in your words. I believe in you.
A wise choice.
Are you sure?
It will be mine.
